translation_texts.translated_text: Please tell us your age. This will not affect gameplay.
I certify that I am sixteen or over, and have read, understood, and accepted your Privacy Policy
By tapping "Confirm", you accept our: <link="PrivacyPolicy"><color=#[COLOR]>Privacy Policy</color></link> and <link="LegalDocument"><color=#[COLOR]>Terms of Use</color></link>

<color=#C91E1E><size=40>Oops!</size>
Check your connection and try again!</color>

To access further functionalities, you need to be connected to the internet
